title: Admin
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this area.
administratorsOnly: This area is restricted to administrators only.

success.userBlocked: User blocked and prevented from logging in.

errors.blockUserFailed: Failed to remove and block user

blockUser.title: Block user
blockUser.description: Are you sure that you want to block this user from the website and prevent them from opening another account with this email address in the future?

unblockUser.title: Unblock user
unblockUser.description: Are you sure you want to unblock this user? They will be able to log in and access the website again.

forumBlock.blockDescription: Are you sure you want to block this user from the forum? They will not be able to create posts or comments.
forumBlock.unblockDescription: Are you sure you want to unblock this user from the forum? They will be able to create posts and comments again.

userProfileDialog.loginRequired: To view this collector's profile and their banknote collection, please log in to your account. If you don't have an account yet, join our community to explore collections and connect with fellow collectors.

statistics.title: Platform Statistics
